sliding module¶

class sliding.SlidingWindow(annot_arr, w_scale, PARAMS)[source]¶

Bases: object

docstring

Slide()[source]¶

Moves a sliding window over the annot_arr of size w_dim Slices are updated into sliced_arr

static get_params(N_dim, w_scale)[source]¶

Returns a feasible sliding window scale and number of iterations
